title: The Circus Train Conspiracy
description: Librarian's note: This is an Alternate Cover Edition for ISBN10: 0749021373 ISBN13: 9780749021375.Following a string of successful performances, the Moscardi Circus is traveling by train to Newcastle for their next show. Yet a collision on the track with a couple of sleepers causes pandemonium: passengers thrown about and animals escaping into the night. When the body of a woman is discovered in nearby woodland, Inspector Colbeck is desperate to lend assistance, believing the two incidents might be connected. Who is the nameless woman and who is targeting the Moscardi's Magnificent Circus?
author: Edward Marston
